name: Branded MMS Coupons
description: An easy to deploy app for sending branded MMS coupons.

DEBUG.description: True or False to run Flask in debug mode

COUPON_SAVE_DIR.description: A place where images are temporarily stored. The default should work fine on Heroku.

QUALIFIED_MEDIA_URL.description: The URL for the temporary coupon image. Example: http://obscure-anchorage-134.herokuapp.com/static/img/

TWILIO_NUMBER.description: US Twilio number for MMS. Format: +12025551234
